apps <- list(
  list(
    slug = "varasjodur_tillaga_utfaersla",
    title = "Styrkjakerfi VR - Reiknivél",

  list(
    slug = "varasjodur_utfaersla",
    title = "FVSA kerfið fyrir VR",
    description = "Reiknivél sem heimfærir styrkjakerfi FVSA yfir á VR"
  )
)

  title <- app$title
  description <- app$description
  
  cat(
    '<div class="col-md-4 mb-4">\n',
    '<div class="card h-100 shadow-sm">\n',
    '<div class="card-body d-flex flex-column">\n',
    '<h5 class="card-title">', title, '</h5>\n',
    '<p class="card-text flex-grow-1">', description, '</p>\n',
    '<a class="btn btn-primary mt-auto" target="_blank" href="https://vrstettarfelag.shinyapps.io/', slug, '/">Opna app &raquo;</a>\n',
    '</div></div></div>\n',
    sep = ""
  )
}

cat("</div>\n")
